wuKong: Functions to WuKong multifunctional expansion board by ELECFREAKS Co.,Ltd.
wuKong.lightIntensity: TODO: Set the brightness of on-board LED lamp.
wuKong.mecanumWheel|param|LeftFront: A servo in the ServoList , eg: wuKong.ServoList.S1
wuKong.mecanumWheel|param|LeftRear: A servo in the ServoList , eg: wuKong.ServoList.S2
wuKong.mecanumWheel|param|RightFront: A servo in the ServoList , eg: wuKong.ServoList.S3
wuKong.mecanumWheel|param|RightRear: A servo in the ServoList , eg: wuKong.ServoList.S4
wuKong.setLightMode: TODO: Set the on-board LED display mode.
wuKong.setMotorSpeed: TODO: Set the speed of M1 or M2 motor.
wuKong.setMotorSpeed|param|motor: M1 or M2 motor , eg: MotorList.M1
